report.name: All Animals
report.description: List all animals. To copy this data into Excel or another application, select the rows to copy (click the top left corner to select all rows), then press Ctrl-C, then paste into the other application.

report.name: Time of Last Location
report.description: Last location for each living animal with a collar in a project
report.query: SELECT A.ProjectId, A.AnimalId, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), MAX(FixDate), 101) AS [Date of Last Location] FROM Locations AS L INNER JOIN Animals AS A ON L.ProjectId = A.ProjectId AND L.AnimalId = A.AnimalId INNER JOIN CollarDeployments AS CD ON CD.ProjectId = A.ProjectId AND CD.AnimalId = A.AnimalId WHERE L.ProjectId = @Project AND MortalityDate IS NULL AND RetrievalDate IS NULL GROUP BY A.ProjectId, A.AnimalId ORDER BY MAX(FixDate) DESC

report.name: Deployments
report.description: All of a project's current deployments
report.query: SELECT AnimalId, CollarId, DeploymentDate FROM CollarDeployments WHERE ProjectId = @Project and RetrievalDate IS NULL ORDER BY DeploymentDate

report.name: Living Animals without a collar
report.description: A Project's living animals without a collar
report.query: SELECT * FROM Animals WHERE ProjectId = @Project AND MortalityDate IS NULL AND AnimalId NOT IN ( SELECT AnimalId FROM CollarDeployments WHERE ProjectId = @Project AND RetrievalDate IS NULL )

report.name: Files with no fixes
report.description: Active files in a project with no fixes
report.query: SELECT CF.ProjectId, CF.[FileName], PF.[FileName] AS Parent, CF.Format, C.CollarModel, C.CollarId, D.PlatformId FROM CollarFiles AS CF INNER JOIN Collars as C ON CF.CollarManufacturer = C.CollarManufacturer AND CF.CollarId = C.CollarId LEFT JOIN CollarFiles AS PF ON CF.ParentFileId = PF.FileId LEFT JOIN CollarFixes AS X ON CF.FileId = X.FileId LEFT JOIN ArgosDeployments AS D ON CF.ArgosDeploymentId = D.DeploymentId INNER JOIN LookupCollarFileFormats AS F ON CF.Format = F.Code WHERE F.ArgosData = 'N' AND CF.[Status] = 'A' AND X.FixId IS NULL AND CF.ProjectId = @Project ORDER BY CF.ProjectId, CF.Format, CollarId, PF.[FileName], CF.[FileName]

report.name: Animals with no fixes
report.description: If a animal has had multiple deployments, and one deployment has fixes, and the other does not, this will report a false positive for the listing the animal with the collar with no fixes
report.query: SELECT A.AnimalId, D.CollarId FROM Animals AS A LEFT JOIN CollarDeployments AS D ON A.ProjectId = D.ProjectId AND A.AnimalId = D.AnimalId LEFT JOIN CollarFixes as F ON D.CollarId = F.CollarId WHERE A.ProjectId = @Project AND F.CollarId IS NULL ORDER BY A.AnimalId

report.name: All fix conflicts in the last 30 days (SLOW!!!)
report.description: All conflicting fixes for all collars deployed (at any time) on a project (SLOW!!!)
report.query: SELECT C.CollarManufacturer, C.CollarId, F.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT CollarManufacturer, CollarId, ProjectId FROM CollarDeployments) AS C CROSS APPLY (SELECT * FROM ConflictingFixes (C.CollarManufacturer, C.CollarId, 30)) AS F WHERE C.ProjectId = @Project

report.name: All fix conflicts (REALLY SLOW!!!)
report.description: All conflicting fixes for all collars deployed (at any time) on a project (SLOW!!!)
report.query: SELECT C.CollarManufacturer, C.CollarId, F.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT CollarManufacturer, CollarId, ProjectId FROM CollarDeployments) AS C CROSS APPLY (SELECT * FROM ConflictingFixes (C.CollarManufacturer, C.CollarId,30000)) AS F WHERE C.ProjectId = @Project

report.name: Summary of fixes by animal (Slow!!!)
report.description: Summary of fixes for all animals in a project (Slow!!!)
report.query: SELECT C.AnimalId, F.* FROM CollarDeployments AS C CROSS APPLY (SELECT * FROM AnimalLocationSummary (C.ProjectId, C.AnimalId)) AS F WHERE C.ProjectId = @Project
